nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -19,16 +19,20 @@

nodes.bodyText: The records for the desktop widgets are not retrieved from the index like the normal list views, but instead from the DB, so the index specific keyword does not exist here. Instead, sorting projects in the projectsWidget should already work without it!
nodes.diffHunk:

                  value="#{DesktopForm.projects}"

+                  sortBy="#{project.title}"
